item.title: We are very sad to hear that Janice Long has died. Sending our love and condolences to her friends and family. She was such a wonderful supporter of the music community and weâ€™ll miss her kindness and enthusiasm tremendously. @janicelongdj

item.title: This November, our leaders will decide the fate of our planet at #COP26 The UN Climate Conference. Sending our best wishes to everyone out there trying to make positive change. #NOMUSICONADEADPLANET

item.title: RT by @thisistunng: I was glad to be included in @thisistunng's brilliant Dead Club project. Here's a story to remind us of how knowing more & fearing less changes us. Band member Mike Lindsay was able to support a friend in her grief thanks to his Dead Club experience. https://www.undertheradarmag.com/interviews/tunng_on_dead_club#
item.dc:creator: @drkathrynmannix
item.description:
I was glad to be included in @thisistunng's brilliant Dead Club project.
Here's a story to remind us of how knowing more & fearing less changes us. Band member Mike Lindsay was able to support a friend in her grief thanks to his Dead Club experience. undertheradarmag.com/interviâ€¦

item.title: R to @thisistunng: We're very very grateful to those of you who have bought tickets, or planned to and we know we'll see you again soon. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused by this. Sending you our love and best wishes. Tunng x
item.dc:creator: @thisistunng
item.description:
We're very very grateful to those of you who have bought tickets, or planned to and we know we'll see you again soon. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused by this.
Sending you our love and best wishes.
Tunng x

item.title: R to @thisistunng: We've been looking forward to this for a long time and have been doing our best to keep plans afloat but several Covid related factors have made it very difficult for us to continue.
item.dc:creator: @thisistunng
item.description: We've been looking forward to this for a long time and have been doing our best to keep plans afloat but several Covid related factors have made it very difficult for us to continue.

item.title: We are very disappointed to announce that we are, for the time being, cancelling our upcoming 'Tunng presents...Dead Club' shows with @maxjohnporter and will hopefully revisit the idea in the near future. (A short thread...)
item.dc:creator: @thisistunng
item.description: We are very disappointed to announce that we are, for the time being, cancelling our upcoming 'Tunng presents...Dead Club' shows with @maxjohnporter and will hopefully revisit the idea in the near future. (A short thread...)

item.title:
News! We're taking orders now for a special re-press of Mother's Daughter. Limited to 500, pressed to recycled vinyl. Each record is unique! These will ship in November. Link below...Tunng x
https://tunng.bandcamp.com/album/mothers-daughter-and-other-songs

item.dc:creator: @thisistunng
item.description:
Here are the ticket links for those 3 very special Manchester, Bristol and London shows we just mentioned. 19/22/23 Sept 2021.
Tunng presents...Dead Club, featuring Max Porter. tunng.co.uk/dead_club/live/
@maxjohnporter @McrFolkFest @Bristol_Beacon @EatYourOwnEars
@StollerHall

item.title: R to @thisistunng: Our Manchester, Bristol and London shows will be extra special performances of 'Tunng presents...Dead Club'. We'll be joined on stage by the incredible Max Porter @maxjohnporter for an in-conversation opening to the show and live readings!
item.dc:creator: @thisistunng
item.description: Our Manchester, Bristol and London shows will be extra special performances of 'Tunng presents...Dead Club'. We'll be joined on stage by the incredible Max Porter @maxjohnporter for an in-conversation opening to the show and live readings!

item.title: R to @thisistunng: Thank you so much to all those of you who bought tickets early. We really appreciate it and we're very sorry we won't get to see all of you this time around. We'll be back! Please contact local promoters for refunds.
item.dc:creator: @thisistunng
item.description: Thank you so much to all those of you who bought tickets early. We really appreciate it and we're very sorry we won't get to see all of you this time around. We'll be back! Please contact local promoters for refunds.
